verbs.description: [ARG0: Neil DeGrasse Tyson] [V: laments] [ARG1: the rise of Donald Trump] . On HBO ’s Real Time , popular science communicator Neil DeGrasse Tyson claims the education system is partially responsible for the rise of Donald Trump . During a panel discussion concerning the presumptive GOP presidential nominee , Tyson points out that the real problem is not Trump , but “ the major portion …
